headline.main: FRENCH REFUGEES ARRIVE ON CLIPPER; ARRIVE FROM EUROPE ON THE CLIPPER

lead_paragraph: The Atlantic Clipper of Pan American Airways arrived at 3:25 o'clock yesterday afternoon at La Guardia Field from Lisbon, Horta, and Bermuda, with forty-seven passengers, including a 4-month-old girl, said to be the youngest so far to arrive from Europe by clipper.
